data.description:
EARLY ACCESS

Dive into the ultimate VR fun fair game, bringing the excitement and social buzz of the original Munich Oktoberfest right to your home. Be among the first to explore this virtual wonderland!

Key Features:
üéØ Fairground Games: Engage in gun shooting, ball throwing, and catapult games.
üé¢ Virtual Motion Rides: Experience thrilling rides with realistic motion effects.
üëï Avatar Customization: Personalize your look with traditional Bavarian outfits and accessories.
üõ†Ô∏è Physics-Based Interactions: Enjoy realistic interactions with objects and games.
üé§ Social Game: Communicate with other players through integrated voice chat and enjoy new 2-player rhythm games.
üé∫ Trombone Simulator: Show off your musical skills and start own in-game band.
üçπ Bartending Game: Test your time management skills in an exciting bartending game.

Game Modes:
üïπÔ∏è Single-Player: Enjoy the festival at your own pace.
üéÆ Multiplayer: Join others in real-time for shared fun and competition.
Progression and Rewards:
üèÖ Leaderboards: Compete for the highest scores and see how you stack up against others.
üèÜ Achievements: Unlock rewards for your accomplishments.
üéÅ Avatar Item Rewards: Earn unique items to further customize your avatar.

So, gear up, explore the bustling fairgrounds, and let the festivities begin! Join the closed beta today and be a part of the fun and socializing at Oktoberfest - The Official Game! 

Socials & webpage https://linktr.ee/oktoberfestgame
